    • Constructor Detail

      • OnlinePlayerJailedEvent

        public OnlinePlayerJailedEvent(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                       int time,
                       java.lang.String jail,
                       java.lang.String cell,
                       java.lang.String reason,
                       boolean muted,
                       java.lang.String jailer)
        New event for when an online player is jailed.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who is being jailed.
        time - The amount of time, in minutes, we are jailing them.
        jail - The name of the jail they will be in.
        cell - The name of the cell they will be in.
        reason - The reason they are being jailed.
        muted - If the player is to be muted in jail or not.
        jailer - The person who jailed them.
